Actions.Text: REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION
REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION

Title: Establishes a grant program for the installation of laundry equipment and facilities in certain schools
Summary: Establishes a grant program for public K-12 schools which are eligible for support provided under Title I of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965, for the purposes of installing laundry equipment for facilities for use by students and parents or guardians of students.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing a grant program for the installation of laundry equipment and facilities in certain schools
